title: Savage Burn
description: The second book in the Savage Trilogy...  My name is Rick Savage but they call me Savage for a reason. But savage that I am, there is only one woman who can tame the beast in me, one woman who sees the real man. I loved Candace. I lost Candace. Now my enemies have targeted her. For this, they will not survive. Iâ€™m back home to save her and win her back, no matter what the cost.
author: Lisa Renee Jones
